an5.68:1.1: “Pubbevaham, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samano panca dhamme bhavesim, panca dhamme bahulikasim.
an5.68:1.8: So kho aham, bhikkhave, imesam ussolhipancamanam dhammanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta yassa yassa abhinnasacchikaraniyassa dhammassa cittam abhininnamesim abhinnasacchikiriyaya,
an5.68:1.9: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunim sati sati ayatane.
an5.68:2.1: So sace akankhim: ‘anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhaveyyam …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteyyan’ti,
an5.68:2.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunim sati sati ayatane.
an5.68:3.1: So sace akankhim …pe… ‘asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an5.68:3.2: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunim sati sati ayatane”ti.
